short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A LANGUAGE EXTENSION FOR LEARNING KOREAN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Through this extension, you will be able to learn Korean through Netflix. 

How it works is that while you're watching a show, the app will ask you along the way to translate what's happening in the scene into English.

If you get it wrong, it will save the phrase that you got incorrect, and follow up with you every few days via email until you're able to get it right.

You must be on a Netflix OR Youtube video in order for it to work.
